Name: Overmind
Description: Overmind is the head of the Zerg, born in the pool of life of the planet Zerus, the origin of all Zerg. It is a huge entity, the ruler of the entire Zerg Swarm, no one knows its age And ability, has spent countless millennia in the Koprulu sector. Because of its strong thinking, the Swarm has become a effective fighting community with a single will, unified action.

$Commands.Tooltip: Allows **Overlords** to transport units.
$Commands.Name: Evolve Ventral Sacs

$Commands.Tooltip: Respawns up to 10 Zerglings at no cost until all Zerglings have returned to life.
$Commands.Name: Zergling Reconstitution

$Commands.Tooltip: Cancels construction of this structure, destroying the structure and giving a partial refund.
$Commands.Name: Cancel

$Commands.Tooltip: Drops the current order without performing it, and allows you to select a different order.
$Commands.Name: Cancel

$Commands.Tooltip: Sends morphed worker units and Overlords to the designated point. Workers rallied to Mineral Fields or Extractors will begin gathering automatically.
$Commands.Name: Set Worker Rally Point

$Commands.Tooltip: Sends morphed worker units and Overlords to the designated point. Workers rallied to Mineral Fields or Extractors will begin gathering automatically.
$Commands.Name: Set Worker Rally Point

$Commands.Tooltip: Sends morphed units to the designated point.
$Commands.Name: Set Rally Point

$Commands.Tooltip: Defensive unit. Can use Spawn Larvae, Spawn Creep Tumor, and Transfusion. Moves much faster on creep.**Can attack ground and air units**
$Commands.Name: Birth Queen

$Commands.Tooltip: Support unit. Can use Spawn Creep Tumor and Rapid Transfusion.**Can attack ground and air units**
$Commands.Name: Birth Swarm Queen

$Commands.Tooltip: Flying Support Unit. Can use Parasite, Ensnare, Spawn Broodlings and Spawn Creep Tumor.
$Commands.Name: Morph to Queen

$Commands.Tooltip:
A burrowed creep generator. Creep feeds nearby Zerg structures. A Creep Tumor can spawn additional Creep Tumors.

Bonus: Zerg move faster on creep.
$Commands.Name: Spawn Creep Tumor

$Commands.Tooltip: Increases the movement speed of **Overlords** and **Overseers**.
$Commands.Name: Evolve Pneumatized Carapace

$Commands.Tooltip: Increases the movement speed of **Overlords** and **Overseers**.
$Commands.Name: Evolve Pneumatized Carapace

$Commands.Tooltip: Allows **Overlords** to transport units.
$Commands.Name: Evolve Ventral Sacs

$Commands.Tooltip: Enables all Zerg ground units to use the Burrow ability. Burrow allows a unit to take cover underground, rendering it unable to attack. A burrowed unit is invisible unless revealed by detectors or effects.
$Commands.Name: Evolve Burrow

$Commands.Tooltip: Respawns up to 10 Zerglings at no cost until all Zerglings have returned to life.
$Commands.Name: Zergling Reconstitution

$Commands.Tooltip: Cerebrate Zasz leads the clan Garm, being the cerebrate who commands the largest number of zergs and most rapid attack. It can spawn large number of free suicide force and deal huge damage to enemy units.
$Commands.Name: Morph Cerebrate: Zasz

$Commands.Tooltip: Cerebrate Daggoth leads the clan Tiamat, being the cerebrate who commands the most ferocious attack. It can spawn various kinds of elite zerg units.
$Commands.Name: Morph Cerebrate: Daggoth

$Commands.Tooltip: Cerebrate Araq leads the clan Jormungand, being the cerebrate who commands the tactical fight. It is responsible for Overmind's base defense.
$Commands.Name: Morph Cerebrate: Araq

$Commands.Tooltip: Summon Leviathan, which can quickly spawn locusts to assist powerful attacks, and can use Creep Warpjump. Leviathan lasts for 60 seconds.
$Commands.Name: Spawn Leviathan

$Commands.Tooltip:
召唤出强大的利维坦，可以快速孵化，以及自身进行强大的攻击。可以使用菌毯传送。利维坦永久存在，同时只能存在一只。

可以对地和对空。
$Commands.Name: Summon Leviathan

$Commands.Tooltip: The Overlord can provide a 20% movement speed bonus within a certain range, and greatly improve the Overlord movement speed and visual field range.
$Commands.Name: Evolve Hive Mind
